title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: KSA-Based STEM Competency Enhancement Project: Mathematical Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can transform real-world problems into mathematical models and solve them using simulation tools.
Learners can apply the KSA (Knowledge-Skills-Attitudes) framework to analyze problems in STEM collaborative projects.
Learners can visually represent project outcomes and derive improvements through peer assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
